ProductPricingClassification.description: The ProductPricingClassification object cannot be null but can be an empty object.

ProductPricingClassificationName.description:
Maps to the field ProductPricingClassifications.ProductPricingClassificationId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

ProductPricingClassificationDescription.description:
Maps to the field ProductPricingClassifications.ProductPricingClassificationDescription in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: allowed
